title: Tommy Sands
content: Folk singer and peace campaigner Tommy Sands reflects on a crossroads that he faced in his early twenties, growing up in a musical family, dealing with grief and offers advice to his younger self.
contentSnippet: Folk singer and peace campaigner Tommy Sands reflects on a crossroads that he faced in his early twenties, growing up in a musical family, dealing with grief and offers advice to his younger self.

itunes.author: BBC Radio Ulster
